attributes.action: Stop excessive charges for Holiday Insurance for the over 65s, lots are fitter than younger people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time that the insurance business did not discriminate against the Senior's of our Country, lots of the over 65s are fitter than the younger people, why when we are on a fixed income should we have to pay three times the amount that others pay for holiday insurance,
